verses.verse: And Bezalel <S%H1212><s%> and Oholiab <S%H171><s%> shall work <S%H6213><s%>, and every <S%H2450><s%> wise-hearted <S%H3820><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, in whom <S%H1992><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath put <S%H5414><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding <S%H8394><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> how to work <S%H6213><s%> all the work <S%H4399><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Bezalel <S%H1212><s%> and Oholiab <S%H171><s%>, and every <S%H2450><s%> wise-hearted <S%H3820><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, in whose heart <S%H3820><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had put <S%H5414><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, even every one whose heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred him up <S%H5375><s%> to come <S%H7126><s%> unto the work <S%H4399><s%> to do it <S%H6213><s%>:

and they received <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> all the offering <S%H8641><s%> which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had brought <S%H935><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, wherewith to make <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H935><s%>. And they brought yet unto him freewill-offerings <S%H5071><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%>.

And all the wise men <S%H2450><s%>, that wrought <S%H6213><s%> all the work <S%H4399><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> from his work <S%H4399><s%> which they wrought <S%H6213><s%>;

and they spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The people <S%H5971><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> much more <S%H7235><s%> than enough <S%H1767><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the work <S%H4399><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave commandment <S%H6680><s%>, and they caused it to be proclaimed <S%H6963><s%> throughout the camp <S%H4264><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let neither man <S%H376><s%> nor woman <S%H802><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> any more work <S%H4399><s%> for the offering <S%H8641><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>. So the people <S%H5971><s%> were restrained <S%H3607><s%> from bringing <S%H935><s%>.
For the stuff <S%H4399><s%> they had was sufficient <S%H1767><s%> for all the work <S%H4399><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H3498><s%>, and too much.

And all the wise-hearted <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H3820><s%> among them that wrought <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%>; of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, and blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, with cherubim <S%H3742><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the skilful <S%H2803><s%> workman <S%H6213><s%>, Bezalel made them.

The length <S%H753><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> was eight <S%H8083><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: all the curtains <S%H3407><s%> had one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>.

And he coupled <S%H2266><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> one <S%H259><s%> to another <S%H259><s%>: and the other five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> he coupled <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H259><s%> to another <S%H259><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> upon the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> from the selvedge <S%H7098><s%> in the coupling <S%H4225><s%>: likewise he made <S%H6213><s%> in the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that was outmost <S%H7020><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling <S%H4225><s%>.

Fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he in the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%>, and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that was in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling <S%H4225><s%>: the loops <S%H3924><s%> were opposite <S%H6901><s%> one <S%H259><s%> to another <S%H259><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and coupled <S%H2266><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> one <S%H259><s%> to another <S%H259><s%> with the clasps <S%H7165><s%>: so the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was one <S%H259><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair for a tent <S%H168><s%> over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>: eleven <S%H6249><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> he made them <S%H6213><s%>.

The length <S%H753><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%>: the eleven <S%H6249><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> had one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>.
And he coupled <S%H2266><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves <S%H8337><s%>, and six curtains by themselves <S%H3407><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that was outmost <S%H7020><s%> in the coupling <S%H4225><s%>, and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he upon the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> which was outmost in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling <S%H2279><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> to couple <S%H2266><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> together <S%H2266><s%>, that it might be one <S%H259><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskins <S%H5785><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, standing up <S%H5975><s%>.

Ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> of a board <S%H7175><s%>, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>.

Each <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%>, joined <S%H7947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another <S%H259><s%>: thus did he make <S%H6213><s%> for all the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>: twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%>;

and he made <S%H6213><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> under the twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for its two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for its two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%>.
And for the second <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, he made <S%H6213><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>,

and their forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>.
And for the hinder <S%H3411><s%> part of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>.
And two <S%H8147><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he for the corners <S%H4742><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in the hinder part <S%H3411><s%>.

And they were double <S%H8382><s%> beneath <S%H4295><s%>; and in like <S%H8382><s%> manner <S%H3162><s%> they were entire unto the top <S%H7218><s%> thereof unto one <S%H259><s%> ring <S%H2885><s%>: thus he did <S%H6213><s%> to both <S%H8147><s%> of them in the two <S%H8147><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%>.

And there were eight <S%H8083><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, sixteen <S%H8337><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%>; under every <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>; five <S%H2568><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>,

and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> for the hinder part <S%H3411><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the middle <S%H8484><s%> bar <S%H1280><s%> to pass <S%H1272><s%> through <S%H8432><s%> in the midst of the boards <S%H7175><s%> from the one end <S%H7097><s%> to the other <S%H7097><s%>.

And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> their rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for places <S%H1004><s%> for the bars <S%H1280><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>: with cherubim <S%H3742><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the skilful <S%H2803><s%> workman <S%H6213><s%>, made he it.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> thereunto four <S%H702><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>: their hooks <S%H2053><s%> were of gold <S%H2091><s%>: and he cast <S%H3332><s%> for them four <S%H702><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> a screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%>, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, the work of the embroiderer <S%H7551><s%>;

and the five <S%H2568><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of it with their hooks <S%H2053><s%>: and he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> their capitals <S%H7218><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>; and their five <S%H2568><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> were of brass <S%H5178><s%>.
